title: My Lab Journal
text: This is a template example for lab journaling. Students in the data science courses at the Institute of Entrepreneurship will use this template to learn R for business analytics. Students can replace this text as they wish.

title: My Lab Journal
text:
How to use

Accept the assignment and get your own github repo.
Blog/journal what you are doing in R, by editing the .qmd files.
See the links page for lots of helpful links on learning R.
Change everything to make it your own.
Make sure to render you website every time before you want to upload changes.

title: Probability Theory
text:
T - Being on time
T_not - Not being on time
S - Change in Scope
S_not - No change in scope

Defining the probabilities from the probability tree


P_S <- 0.3  # Probability of a change in scope
P_S_not <- 0.7  # Probability of no change in scope
P_T_given_S <- 0.2  # Probability of being on time given a change in scope
P_T_given_S_not <- 0.6  # Probability of being on time given no change in scope

P(T ∩ S) - P_T_and_S
(T ∩ ¬S) - P_T_and_S_not
P(¬T ∩ S) - P_not_T_and_S
P(¬T ∩ ¬S) - P_not_T_and_S_not

# Compute the joint probabilities
P_T_and_S <- P_S * P_T_given_S  # P(T ∩ S)
P_T_and_S_not <- P_S_not * P_T_given_S_not  # P(T ∩ ¬S)
P_not_T_and_S <- P_S * (1 - P_T_given_S)  # P(¬T ∩ S)
P_not_T_and_S_not <- P_S_not * (1 - P_T_given_S_not)  # P(¬T ∩ ¬S)


P_T_and_S  

#> [1] 0.06

P_T_and_S_not  

#> [1] 0.42

P_not_T_and_S  

#> [1] 0.24

P_not_T_and_S_not  

#> [1] 0.28



Sum of all probabilities


probabilities_sum <- P_T_and_S + P_T_and_S_not + P_not_T_and_S + P_not_T_and_S_not


probabilities_sum

#> [1] 1

This is a .qmd file. It is plain text with special features. Any time you write just like this, it will be compiled to normal text in the website. If you put a # in front of your text, it will create a top level-header.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.
